name: The Rewind Gun
description:
Story

You find yourself in a world where time is represented physically. You come across a gun that can rewind time, and decide to go on a rampage to discover the power of the gun. However, abusing the gun's power could result in unforeseen side effects.

Controls

A/D - Move left or right

Space bar - Jump

Left click - Use gun

Mouse - Aim gun

P - Pause game

It's recommended to play in a non- full screen window with a short height and a long width for the best performance and quality.

The game uses auto save, so you don't need to worry about saving it or finishing the game in one sitting.

Versions

You can either download the 32-bit version or the 64-bit version. However, 32-bit is recommended.

 - Made for the Brackeys 2020.2 Game Jam-
